text: Whoever maliciously places an obstruction on or near the track of any steam or street railway, or displaces or injures anything appertaining to such track, with intent to endanger the passage of any locomotive or car, shall be imprisoned for not more than 10 years.

division.text: Criminal Law and Procedure and Prisoners.

heading.catch_text: Placing obstructions on or displacement of railway tracks.
